entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
